trans-unit.source: ImageFormatConverter is a class that can be used to convert <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"></xref> objects from one data type to another.
trans-unit.target: ImageFormatConverter 是可以用于将转换的类<xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"></xref>到另一个类型从一个数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: Access this class through the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 访问通过此类<xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: A type converter is used to convert values between data types.
trans-unit.target: 类型转换器用于转换数据类型之间的值。

trans-unit.source: A type converter also supports property configuration at design time by providing text-to-value conversion or a list of values that users can select from.
trans-unit.target: 类型转换器还支持在设计时属性配置，通过提供文本值的转换或用户可以从选择的值的列表。

trans-unit.source: Access the ImageFormatConverter class through the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> class by calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetConverter%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 访问通过 ImageFormatConverter 类<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>类通过调用<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetConverter%2A>方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetConverter%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: The ImageFormatConverter converts to and from known image formats, as specified in the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat> class.
trans-unit.target: ImageFormatConverter 将转换到和从已知的图像格式，规定<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat>类。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you want to convert between image formats, such as converting between BMP and JPEG, use one of the <xref:System.Drawing.Image.Save%2A?displayProperty=fullName> methods that takes an <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat> object as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果你想要转换图像格式，如 BMP 和 JPEG，之间进行转换之间使用之一<xref:System.Drawing.Image.Save%2A?displayProperty=fullName>采用的方法<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat>对象作为参数。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat> </xref:System.Drawing.Image.Save%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.ImageFormatConverter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Drawing.ImageFormatConverter"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Do not create a <xref:System.Drawing.ImageFormatConverter> object directly.
trans-unit.target: 不要创建<xref:System.Drawing.ImageFormatConverter>直接对象。</xref:System.Drawing.ImageFormatConverter>

trans-unit.source: Access the <xref:System.Drawing.ImageFormatConverter> class through the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> class by calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetConverter%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 访问<xref:System.Drawing.ImageFormatConverter>类通过<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>类通过调用<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetConverter%2A>方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetConverter%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> </xref:System.Drawing.ImageFormatConverter>

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether this converter can convert an object in the specified source type to the native type of the converter.
trans-unit.target: 指示此转换器是否可以将指定的源类型的对象转换为转换器的本机类型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.ImageFormatConverter> converts to and from known image formats, as specified in the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.ImageFormatConverter>将转换到和从已知的图像格式，规定<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat>类。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat> </xref:System.Drawing.ImageFormatConverter>

trans-unit.source: A formatter context.
trans-unit.target: 格式化程序上下文。

trans-unit.source: This object can be used to get more information about the environment this converter is being called from.
trans-unit.target: 此对象可以用于获取有关从中调用该转换器的环境的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: This may be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, so you should always check.
trans-unit.target: 这可能是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>，因此应始终对其进行检查。

trans-unit.source: Also, properties on the context object may also return <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 同样，上下文对象上的属性也可能返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The type you want to convert from.
trans-unit.target: 你想要从转换的类型。

trans-unit.source: This method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this object can perform the conversion.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果此对象能够执行转换。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this converter can convert an object to the specified destination type using the context.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示此转换器是否可以将对象转换为使用上下文的指定的目标类型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.ImageFormatConverter> converts to and from known image formats, as specified in the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.ImageFormatConverter>将转换到和从已知的图像格式，规定<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat>类。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat> </xref:System.Drawing.ImageFormatConverter>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that specifies the context for this type conversion.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> ，指定此类型转换的上下文。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> that represents the type to which you want to convert this <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>表示你想要将其转换的类型<xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"></xref>对象。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: This method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this object can perform the conversion.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果此对象能够执行转换。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified object to an <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 指定将对象转换为<xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.ImageFormatConverter> converts to and from known image formats, as specified in the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.ImageFormatConverter>将转换到和从已知的图像格式，规定<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat>类。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat> </xref:System.Drawing.ImageFormatConverter>

trans-unit.source: A formatter context.
trans-unit.target: 格式化程序上下文。

trans-unit.source: This object can be used to get more information about the environment this converter is being called from.
trans-unit.target: 此对象可以用于获取有关从中调用该转换器的环境的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: This may be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, so you should always check.
trans-unit.target: 这可能是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>，因此应始终对其进行检查。

trans-unit.source: Also, properties on the context object may also return <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 同样，上下文对象上的属性也可能返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that specifies formatting conventions for a particular culture.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>对象，它指定针对特定区域性的格式设置约定。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The object to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要转换的对象。

trans-unit.source: The converted object.
trans-unit.target: 被转换的对象。

trans-unit.source: The conversion cannot be completed.
trans-unit.target: 无法完成转换。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified object to the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的对象转换为指定的类型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.ImageFormatConverter> converts to and from known image formats, as specified in the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.ImageFormatConverter>将转换到和从已知的图像格式，规定<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat>类。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat> </xref:System.Drawing.ImageFormatConverter>

trans-unit.source: The most common type conversion is to and from a string type.
trans-unit.target: 最常见的类型转换为字符串类型。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation calls the <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A> method of the object if the object is valid and if the destination type is `string`.
trans-unit.target: 默认实现调用<xref:System.Object.ToString%2A>对象方法的对象是否有效且目标类型为`string`。</xref:System.Object.ToString%2A>

trans-unit.source: If this method cannot convert the specified object to the specified destination type, it throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法无法将指定的对象转换为指定的目标类型，它将引发<xref:System.NotSupportedException>异常。</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: A formatter context.
trans-unit.target: 格式化程序上下文。

trans-unit.source: This object can be used to get more information about the environment this converter is being called from.
trans-unit.target: 此对象可以用于获取有关从中调用该转换器的环境的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: This may be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, so you should always check.
trans-unit.target: 这可能是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>，因此应始终对其进行检查。

trans-unit.source: Also, properties on the context object may also return <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 同样，上下文对象上的属性也可能返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that specifies formatting conventions for a particular culture.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>对象，它指定针对特定区域性的格式设置约定。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The object to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要转换的对象。

trans-unit.source: The type to convert the object to.
trans-unit.target: 要转换到的对象的类型。

trans-unit.source: The converted object.
trans-unit.target: 被转换的对象。

trans-unit.source: The conversion cannot be completed.
trans-unit.target: 无法完成转换。

trans-unit.source: destinationType is
trans-unit.target: destinationType是

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection that contains a set of standard values for the data type this validator is designed for.
trans-unit.target: 获取包含一组用于此验证程序所面向的数据类型的标准值的集合。

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the data type does not support a standard set of values.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果数据类型不支持标准值集。

trans-unit.source: A formatter context.
trans-unit.target: 格式化程序上下文。

trans-unit.source: This object can be used to get more information about the environment this converter is being called from.
trans-unit.target: 此对象可以用于获取有关从中调用该转换器的环境的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: This may be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, so you should always check.
trans-unit.target: 这可能是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>，因此应始终对其进行检查。

trans-unit.source: Also, properties on the context object may also return <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 同样，上下文对象上的属性也可能返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A collection that contains a standard set of valid values, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 包含一组标准的有效的值的集合或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认实现始终返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether this object supports a standard set of values that can be picked from a list.
trans-unit.target: 指示此对象是否支持可以从列表中选取的值的标准集。

trans-unit.source: A type descriptor through which additional context can be provided.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过其提供其他上下文将类型描述符。

trans-unit.source: This method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Drawing.ImageFormatConverter.GetStandardValues*> method should be called to find a common set of values the object supports.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref:System.Drawing.ImageFormatConverter.GetStandardValues*>应调用方法以查找一组公共对象支持的值。</xref:System.Drawing.ImageFormatConverter.GetStandardValues*>
